title: Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
OB: Default values are not shown in the Show Report Parameters dialog. When I preview the report and click on the Show Report Parameters button, the value boxes are all empty.
EB: Expected behavior is that the default values for the parameters should be shown in the value boxes, so that I can easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button.

Actual result:
In the Enter Parameters dialog, all the values are empty, which is not the expected behavior. I expect to see the default values in the value boxes so that I can modify the parameter I want to change.
